articles.title: 'Cannibal' explosion on the sun is hurling to Earth that could trigger radio blackouts - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sunspot AR3078 shot out two ejections of particles, energy and light this week, but the second gobbled up the first. This has created a 'mish mash of the two' that will likely cause strong geometric storms.
